text:
Did the Swim Australia Teacher course with Ryan, James, Carol and Crystal â€” the A-team! The day was really engaging, full of useful tips and enriching practical learning.

They know their stuff and also shared a lot of helpful advice on the kind of soft skills that are necessary when you're actually out there teaching. A great experience, felt well-supported and came away with a lot more confidence and enthusiasm thanks to them.

There was a very detailed analysis accompanied by a video evaluation on our swim strokes followed by an evaluation with recommendations on improvement.
Role-plays were used to apply what we learnt and a lot of guidance from the coaches. These role plays were very closely related or mimicking real life situations during coaching.
Overall, it was a very rewarding experience.

The coaches Ryan, James, Carol and Crystal were really knowledgeable and had good emphasis on stroke techniques. They also shared valuable experience by highlighting & anticipating some soft skills that might be needed at situations.

The friendly instructors are the ones that make this experience very great as they give us a lot of feedback regarding of flaws so that we can improve and be a great coach. They also make our lessons fun and interesting by making us laugh at times.

A big shoutout to Coach Ryan and his team. Especially Coach Ryan. He is very patient with young children. His lessons are always fun and engaging. My kids look forward to swimming lessons every week. Highly recommended!
